custom_nodes.description: Succeeds if the guess matches the target, fails otherwise.
custom_nodes.name: Sample.check_guess(target)
custom_nodes.title: Sample.check_guess(target)

custom_nodes.description:
Chooses a random number between 1 and 10 and saves it to `context.guess`.  Also 
increments `context.guess_count`.

(Note this will error and the bot will die if `guess_count` has not been set.)
custom_nodes.name: Sample.make_guess()
custom_nodes.title: Sample.make_guess()

custom_nodes.description: Fails or succeeds based on if `context.guess_count` is less than `max_guesses`.
custom_nodes.name: Sample.more_guesses_left?(max_guesses)
custom_nodes.title: Sample.more_guesses_left?(max_guesses)

custom_nodes.description: Validates the guess count (used in integration tests).
custom_nodes.name: Sample.validate_guess_count(expected)
custom_nodes.title: Sample.validate_guess_count(expected)

custom_nodes.description: Makes sure the provided number is between 0 and 10 (inclusive)
custom_nodes.name: Sample.validate_number(n)
custom_nodes.title: Sample.validate_number(n)

trees.description: The root of this tree.  You can set tree-wide properties on this node and use them in an action's "args" property with this notation: `{{key_name}}`.

a2254ccd-6747-4749-9e98-b5dfdf4a9f06.description: Takes multiple children and runs them from top to bottom (or left to right).  If any fail, this node fails, if all succeed, this node succeeds.

f82c539c-46c6-4520-938b-b00295711dab.description: Takes one child which it repeats until it succeeds.  This node always succeeds.

f82c539c-46c6-4520-938b-b00295711dab.title: Repeat until succeed

fde12906-19ed-44ab-996c-ec7803008ea3.description: "Pauses" the bot for the specified number of seconds.  You can specify two numbers (like `wait(1,10)`) to wait a random number of seconds between those numbers.

fde12906-19ed-44ab-996c-ec7803008ea3.title: wait(1)
